channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- Autodesk Civil 3D
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- Autodesk Civil 3D

item.title: CVE-2019-7360|2024-08-04T20:46:46.198Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20civil%203d
item.description: An exploitable use-after-free vulnerability in the DXF-parsing functionality in Autodesk Advance Steel 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Architecture 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Electrical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Map 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Mechanical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD MEP 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD P&ID 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Plant 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD LT 2018, and Autodesk Civil 3D 2018. A specially crafted DXF file may trigger a use-after-free, resulting in code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-7361|2024-08-04T20:46:46.387Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20civil%203d
item.description: An attacker may convince a victim to open a malicious action micro (.actm) file that has serialized data, which may trigger a code execution in Autodesk Advance Steel 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Architecture 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Electrical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Map 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Mechanical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD MEP 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD P&ID 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Plant 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD LT 2018, and Autodesk Civil 3D 2018.
